full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA K'A R'A'I RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I 'BUM BSANGS BEEd'URYA'I SNGON PO BKRA SHIS 'DOD PA'I RE SKONG MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,

author_simple: JAM DBYANGS DGA' BA'I BLO GROS,
